message.content: This question relies on the concept of the position of the sun in the sky at different times of the day. When John's shadow looks like it's directly underneath him, it means that the sun is directly overhead, which occurs at noon (12pm) when the sun is at its highest point in the sky. Options (A) and (D) are incorrect because the sun would not be directly overhead at 9am or 2pm. Option (C) is incorrect because 12am refers to midnight, which is when the sun is not visible in the sky.
